extension.description: Writes the selected text in the editor to a Notion page organized by date.
command.write.title: Write Selection to Notion (Markdown Enabled)
command.writeText.title: Write Selection as Text to Notion
command.writeCodeBlock.title: Write Selection as a Code Block to Notion
configuration.dateFormat.description: Date Format. Used in the page title. ※format: https://date-fns.org/v4.1.0/docs/format
configuration.writeTimestamp.description: Write a timestamp along with the text.
